thread.title: Robert Hill
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Robert Hill

author: Robert Hill
title: Robert Hill
text:
My experience with all the staff at Optima Tax was always a good professional one. All the staff that I was associated with treated me with respect. They did not judge me , they just helped to realize not to be stubborn and ignore the facts. They put me on the right track
Thank you
Robert Hill
